trans-unit.source: Identifies the configuration settings for Web proxy server.
trans-unit.target: 識別 Web proxy 伺服器的組態設定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement.AutoDetectValues> value that controls whether the Web proxy is automatically detected.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement.AutoDetectValues>值，控制是否會自動偵測 Web proxy。</xref:System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement.AutoDetectValues>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement.AutoDetectValues> if the <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"></xref> is automatically detected; <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement.AutoDetectValues> if the <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"></xref> is not automatically detected; or <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement.AutoDetectValues>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement.AutoDetectValues>如果<xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"></xref>會自動偵測。<xref:System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement.AutoDetectValues>如果<xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"></xref>無法自動偵測; 或<xref:System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement.AutoDetectValues>.</xref:System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement.AutoDetectValues> </xref:System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement.AutoDetectValues></xref:System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement.AutoDetectValues>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether local resources are retrieved by using a Web proxy server.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否使用 Web proxy 伺服器來擷取本機資源。

trans-unit.source: This configuration element controls whether requests for resources on the LAN are sent to the proxy server or sent directly to the host where the resource resides.
trans-unit.target: 這個組態項目會控制是否傳送至 proxy 伺服器或直接傳送到主機資源所在的區域網路上的資源要求。

trans-unit.source: Avalue that indicates whether local resources are retrieved by using a Web proxy server.
trans-unit.target: 值，指出是否使用 Web proxy 伺服器來擷取本機資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URI that identifies the Web proxy server to use.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定識別要使用的 Web proxy 伺服器的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref:System.Uri> value that specifies the location of the automatic proxy detection script.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Uri>值，指定位置的自動 proxy 偵測指令碼。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> specifying the location of the automatic proxy detection script.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Uri>指定位置的自動 proxy 偵測指令碼。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that controls whether the Internet Explorer Web proxy settings are used.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Boolean>值，控制是否使用 Internet Explorer Web proxy 設定。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Internet Explorer LAN settings are used to detect and configure the default <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"></xref> used for requests; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 Internet Explorer LAN 設定可用來偵測及設定預設<xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"></xref>用要求，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
